text: Egha Moses ua mɨgei, “Ikiavɨra Itir God uabɨ guaratɨzimɨn asɨzir tuziba ia danightɨ ia dar amam. Egh a mɨzarazibar bret ia danightɨ, ia uan ifongiabar a iniam. An orazi ia puram a mɨgei. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, a dagheba ia danɨngam. Ezɨ ga pura bizimning. Ia gan atara ga mɨgeir puvatɨ. Ia Ikiavɨra Itir Godra an atara a mɨgei.”
